24 #include "config.h"
25 
26 #include <stdio.h>
27 #include <string.h>
28 #include <time.h>
29 #include <ctype.h>
30 #include <stdlib.h>
31 #include <unistd.h>
32 #include <assert.h>
33 #include <inttypes.h>
34 #include <unistd.h>
35 
36 #include "bgpstream.h"
37 
38 #define PROJECT_CMD_CNT 10
39 #define TYPE_CMD_CNT 10
40 #define COLLECTOR_CMD_CNT 100
41 #define WINDOW_CMD_CNT 1024
42 #define OPTION_CMD_CNT 1024
43 
44 struct window {
45  uint32_t start;
46  uint32_t end;
47 };
48 
49 static bgpstream_t *bs;
50 static bgpstream_data_interface_id_t datasource_id_default = 0;
51 static bgpstream_data_interface_id_t datasource_id = 0;
52 static bgpstream_data_interface_info_t *datasource_info = NULL;
53 
54 static void data_if_usage() {
55  bgpstream_data_interface_id_t *ids = NULL;
56  int id_cnt = 0;
57  int i;
58 
59  bgpstream_data_interface_info_t *info = NULL;
60 
61  id_cnt = bgpstream_get_data_interfaces(bs, &ids);
62 
63  for(i=0; i<id_cnt; i++)
64  {
65  info = bgpstream_get_data_interface_info(bs, ids[i]);
66 
67  if(info != NULL)
68  {
69  fprintf(stderr,
70  " %-15s%s%s\n", info->name, info->description,
71  (ids[i] == datasource_id_default) ? " (default)" : "");
72  }
73  }
74 }
75 
76 static void dump_if_options() {
77  assert(datasource_id != 0);
78 
79  bgpstream_data_interface_option_t *options;
80  int opt_cnt = 0;
81  int i;
82 
83  opt_cnt = bgpstream_get_data_interface_options(bs, datasource_id, &options);
84 
85  fprintf(stderr, "Data interface options for '%s':\n", datasource_info->name);
86  if(opt_cnt == 0)
87  {
88  fprintf(stderr, " [NONE]\n");
89  }
90  else
91  {
92  for(i=0; i<opt_cnt; i++)
93  {
94  fprintf(stderr, " %-15s%s\n",
95  options[i].name, options[i].description);
96  }
97  }
98  fprintf(stderr, "\n");
99 }
100 
101 static void usage() {
102  fprintf(stderr,
103  "usage: bgpreader -w <start,end> [<options>]\n"
104  "Available options are:\n"
105  " -d <interface> use the given data interface to find available data\n"
106  " available data interfaces are:\n");
107  data_if_usage();
108  fprintf(stderr,
109  " -o <option-name,option-value>*\n"
110  " set an option for the current data interface.\n"
111  " use '-o ?' to get a list of available options for the current\n"
112  " data interface. (data interface can be selected using -d)\n"
113  " -p <project> process records from only the given project (routeviews, ris)*\n"
114  " -c <collector> process records from only the given collector*\n"
115  " -t <type> process records with only the given type (ribs, updates)*\n"
116  " -w <start,end> process records only within the given time window*\n"
117  " -P <period> process a rib files every <period> seconds (bgp time)\n"
118  " -b make blocking requests for BGP records\n"
119  " allows bgpstream to be used to process data in real-time\n"
120  "\n"
121  " -r print info for each BGP record (default)\n"
122  " -m print info for each BGP valid record in bgpdump -m format\n"
123  " -e print info for each element of a valid BGP record\n"
124  "\n"
125  " -h print this help menu\n"
126  "* denotes an option that can be given multiple times\n"
127  );
128 }
129 
130 // print functions
131 
132 static void print_bs_record(bgpstream_record_t * bs_record);
133 static int print_elem(bgpstream_elem_t *elem);
134 
135 
136 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
137 {
138 
139  int opt;
140  int prevoptind;
141 
142  opterr = 0;
143 
144  // variables associated with options
145  char *projects[PROJECT_CMD_CNT];
146  int projects_cnt = 0;
147 
148  char *types[TYPE_CMD_CNT];
149  int types_cnt = 0;
150 
151  char *collectors[COLLECTOR_CMD_CNT];
152  int collectors_cnt = 0;
153 
154  struct window windows[WINDOW_CMD_CNT];
155  char *endp;
156  int windows_cnt = 0;
157 
158  char *interface_options[OPTION_CMD_CNT];
159  int interface_options_cnt = 0;
160 
161  int rib_period = 0;
162  int blocking = 0;
163  int record_output_on = 0;
164  int record_bgpdump_output_on = 0;
165  int elem_output_on = 0;
166 
167  bgpstream_data_interface_option_t *option;
168 
169  int i;
170 
171 
172  // required to be created before usage is called
173  bs = bgpstream_create();
174  if(!bs) {
175  fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Could not create BGPStream instance\n");
176  return -1;
177  }
178  datasource_id_default = datasource_id = bgpstream_get_data_interface_id(bs);
179  datasource_info = bgpstream_get_data_interface_info(bs, datasource_id);
180  assert(datasource_id != 0);
181 
182  while (prevoptind = optind,
183  (opt = getopt (argc, argv, "d:o:p:c:t:w:P:brmeh?")) >= 0)
184  {
185  if (optind == prevoptind + 2 && (optarg == NULL || *optarg == '-') ) {
186  opt = ':';
187  -- optind;
188  }
189  switch (opt)
190  {
191  case 'p':
192  if(projects_cnt == PROJECT_CMD_CNT)
193  {
194  fprintf(stderr,
195  "ERROR: A maximum of %d projects can be specified on "
196  "the command line\n",
197  PROJECT_CMD_CNT);
198  usage();
199  exit(-1);
200  }
201  projects[projects_cnt++] = strdup(optarg);
202  break;
203  case 'c':
204  if(collectors_cnt == COLLECTOR_CMD_CNT)
205  {
206  fprintf(stderr,
207  "ERROR: A maximum of %d collectors can be specified on "
208  "the command line\n",
209  COLLECTOR_CMD_CNT);
210  usage();
211  exit(-1);
212  }
213  collectors[collectors_cnt++] = strdup(optarg);
214  break;
215  case 't':
216  if(types_cnt == TYPE_CMD_CNT)
217  {
218  fprintf(stderr,
219  "ERROR: A maximum of %d types can be specified on "
220  "the command line\n",
221  TYPE_CMD_CNT);
222  usage();
223  exit(-1);
224  }
225  types[types_cnt++] = strdup(optarg);
226  break;
227  case 'w':
228  if(windows_cnt == WINDOW_CMD_CNT)
229  {
230  fprintf(stderr,
231  "ERROR: A maximum of %d windows can be specified on "
232  "the command line\n",
233  WINDOW_CMD_CNT);
234  usage();
235  exit(-1);
236  }
237  /* split the window into a start and end */
238  if((endp = strchr(optarg, ',')) == NULL)
239  {
240  fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Malformed time window (%s)\n", optarg);
241  fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Expecting start,end\n");
242  usage();
243  exit(-1);
244  }
245  *endp = '\0';
246  endp++;
247  windows[windows_cnt].start = atoi(optarg);
248  windows[windows_cnt].end = atoi(endp);
249  windows_cnt++;
250  break;
251  case 'P':
252  rib_period = atoi(optarg);
253  break;
254  case 'd':
255  if((datasource_id =
256  bgpstream_get_data_interface_id_by_name(bs, optarg)) == 0)
257  {
258  fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Invalid data interface name '%s'\n",
259  optarg);
260  usage();
261  exit(-1);
262  }
263  datasource_info =
264  bgpstream_get_data_interface_info(bs, datasource_id);
265  break;
266  case 'o':
267  if(interface_options_cnt == OPTION_CMD_CNT)
268  {
269  fprintf(stderr,
270  "ERROR: A maximum of %d interface options can be specified\n",
271  OPTION_CMD_CNT);
272  usage();
273  exit(-1);
274  }
275  interface_options[interface_options_cnt++] = strdup(optarg);
276  break;
277 
278  case 'b':
279  blocking = 1;
280  break;
281  case 'r':
282  record_output_on = 1;
283  break;
284  case 'm':
285  record_bgpdump_output_on = 1;
286  break;
287  case 'e':
288  elem_output_on = 1;
289  break;
290  case ':':
291  fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Missing option argument for -%c\n", optopt);
292  usage();
293  exit(-1);
294  break;
295  case '?':
296  case 'v':
297  fprintf(stderr, "bgpreader version %d.%d.%d\n",
298  BGPSTREAM_MAJOR_VERSION,
299  BGPSTREAM_MID_VERSION,
300  BGPSTREAM_MINOR_VERSION);
301  usage();
302  exit(0);
303  break;
304  default:
305  usage();
306  exit(-1);
307  }
308  }
309 
310  for(i=0; i<interface_options_cnt; i++)
311  {
312  if(*interface_options[i] == '?')
313  {
314  dump_if_options();
315  usage();
316  exit(0);
317  }
318  else
319  {
320  /* actually set this option */
321  if((endp = strchr(interface_options[i], ',')) == NULL)
322  {
323  fprintf(stderr,
324  "ERROR: Malformed data interface option (%s)\n",
325  interface_options[i]);
326  fprintf(stderr,
327  "ERROR: Expecting <option-name>,<option-value>\n");
328  usage();
329  exit(-1);
330  }
331  *endp = '\0';
332  endp++;
333  if((option =
334  bgpstream_get_data_interface_option_by_name(bs, datasource_id,
335  interface_options[i])) == NULL)
336  {
337  fprintf(stderr,
338  "ERROR: Invalid option '%s' for data interface '%s'\n",
339  interface_options[i], datasource_info->name);
340  usage();
341  exit(-1);
342  }
343  bgpstream_set_data_interface_option(bs, option, endp);
344  }
345  free(interface_options[i]);
346  interface_options[i] = NULL;
347  }
348  interface_options_cnt = 0;
349 
350  if(windows_cnt == 0)
351  {
352  fprintf(stderr,
353  "ERROR: At least one time window must be specified using -w\n");
354  usage();
355  exit(-1);
356  }
357 
358  // if the user did not specify any output format
359  // then the default one is per record
360  if(record_output_on == 0 && elem_output_on == 0 && record_bgpdump_output_on == 0) {
361  record_output_on = 1;
362  }
363 
364  // the program can now start
365 
366  // allocate memory for interface
367 
368  /* projects */
369  for(i=0; i<projects_cnt; i++)
370  {
371  bgpstream_add_filter(bs, BGPSTREAM_FILTER_TYPE_PROJECT, projects[i]);
372  free(projects[i]);
373  }
374 
375  /* collectors */
376  for(i=0; i<collectors_cnt; i++)
377  {
378  bgpstream_add_filter(bs, BGPSTREAM_FILTER_TYPE_COLLECTOR, collectors[i]);
379  free(collectors[i]);
380  }
381 
382  /* types */
383  for(i=0; i<types_cnt; i++)
384  {
385  bgpstream_add_filter(bs, BGPSTREAM_FILTER_TYPE_RECORD_TYPE, types[i]);
386  free(types[i]);
387  }
388 
389  /* windows */
390  for(i=0; i<windows_cnt; i++)
391  {
392  bgpstream_add_interval_filter(bs, windows[i].start, windows[i].end);
393  }
394 
395  /* frequencies */
396  if(rib_period > 0)
397  {
398  bgpstream_add_rib_period_filter(bs, rib_period);
399  }
400 
401  /* datasource */
402  bgpstream_set_data_interface(bs, datasource_id);
403 
404  /* blocking */
405  if(blocking != 0)
406  {
407  bgpstream_set_blocking(bs);
408  }
409 
410  // allocate memory for bs_record
411  bgpstream_record_t *bs_record = bgpstream_record_create();
412  if(bs_record == NULL)
413  {
414  fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Could not create BGPStream record\n");
415  bgpstream_destroy(bs);
416  return -1;
417  }
418 
419  // turn on interface
420  if(bgpstream_start(bs) < 0) {
421  fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Could not init BGPStream\n");
422  return -1;
423  }
424 
425  // use the interface
426  int get_next_ret = 0;
427  bgpstream_elem_t * bs_elem;
428  do
429  {
430  get_next_ret = bgpstream_get_next_record(bs, bs_record);
431  if(get_next_ret && record_output_on)
432  {
433  print_bs_record(bs_record);
434  }
435  if(get_next_ret && bs_record->status == BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_VALID_RECORD)
436  {
437  if(record_bgpdump_output_on)
438  {
439  bgpstream_record_print_mrt_data(bs_record);
440  }
441  if(elem_output_on)
442  {
443  while((bs_elem =
444  bgpstream_record_get_next_elem(bs_record)) != NULL)
445  {
446  if(print_elem(bs_elem) != 0)
447  {
448  goto err;
449  }
450  }
451  }
452  }
453  }
454  while(get_next_ret > 0);
455 
456  // de-allocate memory for bs_record
457  bgpstream_record_destroy(bs_record);
458 
459  // turn off interface
460  bgpstream_stop(bs);
461 
462  // deallocate memory for interface
463  bgpstream_destroy(bs);
464 
465  return 0;
466 
467  err:
468  bgpstream_record_destroy(bs_record);
469  bgpstream_stop(bs);
470  bgpstream_destroy(bs);
471  return -1;
472 }
473 
474 // print utility functions
475 
476 static char* get_dump_type_str(bgpstream_record_dump_type_t dump_type)
477 {
478  switch(dump_type)
479  {
480  case BGPSTREAM_UPDATE:
481  return "update";
482  case BGPSTREAM_RIB:
483  return "rib";
484  }
485  return "";
486 }
487 
488 static char* get_dump_pos_str(bgpstream_dump_position_t dump_pos)
489 {
490  switch(dump_pos)
491  {
492  case BGPSTREAM_DUMP_START:
493  return "start";
494  case BGPSTREAM_DUMP_MIDDLE:
495  return "middle";
496  case BGPSTREAM_DUMP_END:
497  return "end";
498  }
499  return "";
500 }
501 
502 static char *get_record_status_str(bgpstream_record_status_t status)
503 {
504  switch(status)
505  {
506  case BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_VALID_RECORD:
507  return "valid_record";
508  case BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_FILTERED_SOURCE:
509  return "filtered_source";
510  case BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_EMPTY_SOURCE:
511  return "empty_source";
512  case BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_CORRUPTED_SOURCE:
513  return "corrupted_source";
514  case BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_CORRUPTED_RECORD:
515  return "corrupted_record";
516  }
517  return "";
518 }
519 
520 
521 static void print_bs_record(bgpstream_record_t * bs_record)
522 {
523  assert(bs_record);
524  printf("%ld|", bs_record->attributes.record_time);
525  printf("%s|", bs_record->attributes.dump_project);
526  printf("%s|", bs_record->attributes.dump_collector);
527  printf("%s|", get_dump_type_str(bs_record->attributes.dump_type));
528  printf("%s|", get_record_status_str(bs_record->status));
529  printf("%ld|", bs_record->attributes.dump_time);
530  printf("%s|", get_dump_pos_str(bs_record->dump_pos));
531  printf("\n");
532 
533 }
534 
535 static char elem_buf[65536];
536 static int print_elem(bgpstream_elem_t *elem)
537 {
538  assert(elem);
539 
540  if(bgpstream_elem_snprintf(elem_buf, 65536, elem) == NULL)
541  {
542  fprintf(stderr, "Failed to construct elem string\n");
543  elem_buf[65535] = '\0';
544  fprintf(stderr, "Elem string: %s\n", elem_buf);
545  return -1;
546  }
547  printf("%s\n", elem_buf);
548  return 0;
549 }
